isBusy - Variable in class ir.control.WebCrawler.CrawlerThread
isBusy flag, initially false
isBusy() - Method in class ir.control.WebCrawler.CrawlerThread
Function to determine if a thread is busy.
isBusy_lock - Variable in class ir.control.WebCrawler.CrawlerThread
Lock for synchronized access to isBusy flag (since the main thread/crawler and the current thread can ask for it)
isCrawling - Variable in class ir.control.WebCrawler
Flag that indicates if the system is currently crawling.
isCrawling() - Method in class ir.control.WebCrawler
Function to assert if crawler is busy crawling
isExcluded(URL) - Method in class ir.control.WebCrawler
Function to check if a URL has been marked as excluded
isValid(URL) - Method in class ir.control.WebCrawler
Function to check if a URL is valid At this point the function only returns true, but it's left as an easy alternative for embedding additional URL verifications, in the future.
isVisited(URL) - Method in class ir.control.WebCrawler
Function to check if a URL has been visited Note: Uses visitedUrls_lock Additionally we perform some special checks so as to prevent visiting the same page when it has different URLS.
isVisitedHost(URL) - Method in class ir.control.WebCrawler
Function to check if a URLs host has been visited.
ItemUrl - Class in ir.model
A POJO to keep together an URL with its depth
